name: State-buddy
tagline: Chrome Extension To Save And Recall Application State
body:
### State Buddy.


### Stop Wasting Time
Too much time of your time is spent clicking buttons, dragging sliders, and waiting for API calls to finish to get you application in the state you are currently developing for. With State Buddy, you can save all your states and recall them instantly.

### Setup
In order to work with State Buddy, your app needs a centralized store that holds onto your application state. This is most easily accomplishable through libraries like Redux or Baobab.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
